review: i enjoyed this game a lot each mechanic was introduced rather well even if i did get lost for a bit here and there as for the story there was enough twists to keep me on my toes and enough that i missed that wanted me to keep playing more i would recommend this game
the most cute and submissive stealth game ive ever played
mouse game that makes all my redwall dreams a reality thumbsup

an incredibly charming stealth game that really succeeds at making such a small area feel so big and detailed it is simple in what it offers you to do but finds ways of making those areas get used to the fullest in multiple quests the only issues i would say the game has come down to a handful of bugs with achievement progression maps not being marked after being told they would be or visual and framerate bugs occassionally popping up

overall good a few minor complaints like maps not showing the exit points and to where and the platform jumping luckily platforming only happens very rarely there were a few issues getting the game to work but just limited the frame rate and messed around with the resolution
such a cute game played it on and off over the years but never beat it always loved showing off the graphics to my friends hoping to actually beat it this week

ive played so little of this game but i am already enchanted by the setting it drops you into  the little mouse you get to play as is absolutely adorable i cant stop smiling watching his little ears bounce as he walks  this is a fun little stealth zeldalike so far look forward to playing more of it
goat is absolutely one of my favourite games i come back  play every other year very much look forward to goat 2
great game a small setting but the world feels big clever game engaging and beautiful
absolutely adorable and great story
what happened to his wife i want to know please just release the next game the game was okay but its bothering me more that i dont know what happened its been 7 years

this game had me hooked the moment i started years ago the lady played it and i finally had a chance i started on playstation but bought on pc to play on the road could not put it down im left wanting more looking forward to prospects of a sequel
good game and good story the map was a bit confusing lots of overlapping tunnels made it hard to find things i spent waaaaay to long wandering in circles looking for things

gameplay and atmosphere are fine but for my tastes too many tasks going on in parallel not clear if to complete them you must stay in the current map or may need to wait for next ones the maps are also bad found myself back and forth on the same place and cannot find anymore where i wanted to go moreover i have to physically detach any other controller before launching the game to be able to use the keyboard or the gamepad ill keep it for the notebook when ive nothing else to do

stealth metroidvania with cool characters and cute rodents nice graphics and level design can be a little rough around the edges sometimes but this game its so good you just dont even care  if you like rodents this is a 1010 if you dont care about rodents then its a great game anyway

even though there is no voice acting the game does not need it one bit it is beautiful and challenging i get a real rats of nimh vibe from it and main reason i bought it will 100 be buying more games from these developers

this is a true gem  story 1010 graphics 1010  beautiful micy twist  1010 costumes 9510  walkin slow in full armor brought out my ptsd from skyrim where i overpacked my character 1200300  gameplay 710 hard to figure out what where with whom sometimes the maps arent helpful but after a replay it will be easier bugs  yes but forgiveable hard to handle the throwable items fast when they are needed the aiming system could be better  im looking forward the continuation

this is honestly one of my favorite stories i absolutely love this game  the atmosphere the emotions the sounds  everything is so calming yet exciting at the same time it just pulls you in a solid 1010 from me
pretty good game is a bit slow but doing all achievements at the same time makes it very interesting and kind of challenging too was pretty fun
makes me nauseous and the gameplay just doesnt feel fun cute mouse costumes though
absolutely gorgeous game sadly i dont like stealth games that much to play it through
fun adventure light stealth
truly a gem

lovely game  just started playing really impressed  graphics are superb rat looks so real with a guitar on back  that innocent look  which made me feel bad for the trapped little dude  give it a try  5 star

i thouroughly enjoyed my time with this very sweet and engaging adventure game  so much so that i wish the developper would expand on this rich and charming universe

great story great graphics great soundtrack and great gameplay missions are sometimes a bit vague and theres a lot of running back and forth but all in all ive truly enjoyed this game
this game was a lot of fun  the major action for the main character is eluding enemies so if you like  lovely landscapes and searching for items you will enjoy this game

this game was a delightful experience dripping in personality  it never felt too difficult or too easy  i genuinely cared for the characters  the music is some of the best ive heard in some time  lovely

a nice little game
an incredible game that i wish had a sequel
amazing hidden gem the story and the characters are great and it reminded me a lot of redwall i really hope a sequel will be released

its simply a fetch quest game lot of quests are so vague on what to do or where to go pretty sure you are gonna look for a walkthrough  gameplay is bare bone and the game is easy enough but some achievements are just ridiculous to get when the entire game is not even that engaging story is fine though with some little twists here and there good for one time playthorugh
good game looks beautiful very nice area design gameplay is fun especially once you get used to it only remarks quest description could be a bit better and the last  quest is kinda rubbish

i really enjoyed this game loved the charactersdialogueexploration it got tedious at times with the fetch quests and backtracking even with maps i was still getting lost and not knowing where to find anything i definitely had to pull up guides to finish certain quests even then i really liked this game and i cant wait for the sequel
a beautiful indiegame a true hidden gem
cant recommend because i cant play it  game has massive bugs during startup and in menu  unplayable for me

such a small game in such a huge world that really needs to be expanded upon sequels films or books ill gladly buy em   the story the characters the lore the music and the environment i love it all  the game itself honestly reminds me a lot about redwall and if you like redwall youll love this game  dont be a pirate scrunt buy it

truly a hidden gem im sad to have waited so long to get the game and it was only because a friend gifted it to me from my wishlist  a pleasant story and adventure game one of the few games that did story and immersion right the game mechanics are nothing to scream about but this was truly a labor of love i look forward to the sequel
often tedious sometimes unpolished but a real gem nonetheless   really fell for all of the characters and the world in the third half  looking forward to the sequel  god speed devs

this game has the aesthetic of redwall and an interesting story good gameplay and great design i am thoroughly enjoying it

very cute and challenging 1012 hour game good story memorable characters lovely environment
such a cute game and the game play works id love a sequel

gah trying to break out of the prison as a nervous 11 year old was too much for me and i plan to come back and play the game again soon i must say during the 38 minutes i played i did get heavy redwall vibes redwall is a book series of incredibly detailed stories of fictional animals so that was good i honestly wish more games like this was made with diffrent and intrecit stories
the makers have clearly put a lot of attention into making this game very wellcrafted should get more recognition much more than a lot of the animal simulator type games out there
if you can get past a little jank goat is very charming and surprisingly fun

i loved this game so much this game got me back in to gaming being the first game in years where i just couldnt wait to spend my day off playing this so cozy and very beautifull yet interactive cant wait for more
this game was an absolute gem and a must play for people who like stealth action games you would think this was a triple a game with how well it was made please make a sequel
amazing game love the stealth challenges and the heart warming story really kept me engaged all the way through even to the bittersweet ending truly hope they make a sequel

tedius backtracking aside this game was so much more than i thought it would be at some point i just wanted it to end sooner and at some point i didnt want it to end super adorable characters and great writing and bits of suspense and i wish i had paid a lot more attention to everything when i started playing
a fun stealth rpg with plenty of depth and story to explore considering that this isnt a aaa title but an indie project its well worth your time and money
for some reason i love the game especially the soundtrack definitely lookin forward to ghost of a tale 2

i really loved it i hope we get a sequel the story was great i dont think youll regret playing it

beautiful visuals adorable and memorable characters a fantastic story with wonderful world building i really enjoyed playing this and how detailed everything is i got so wrapped up in every sidequest and really enjoyed all the dialogue too the books and lore are so captivating and i cant wait for the sequel a wonderful game that is definitely worth experiencing

i enjoyed this cute little game very much if you love a good story and dont mind reading a lot this is your game  to be fair i wouldnt call it an action rpg since there is almost no action and only a few rpg elements it is a story based stealth game also the questdesign is very simple gather stuff and bring it to someone but the story the music and the characters kept me motivated till the end i really hope for part 2
very casual game not a lot of action many of the characters were enjoyable but i wish you werent confined to such a small map i do recommend it only if you like stealth heavy gameplay  cute creatures

at first game was a little bit strange to me but after a short time of playing i knew it was worth buying i am really impressed by the story in this game which i was not expecting to be this interesting i am waiting for a part 2

i really enjoyed this game so much that i was hoping that there would me more just as the credits rolled  i paid a few quid in the sale and played for over 20 hours  excellent value its rare for me to admit that i would not have regretted paying full price for this one
has a brave squeaker still waiting on the sequel though
this is actually a really fun game oddly reminds me of kings quest

its a great pickup during the seasonal sales heres a few pointers   game looks great  characters are have very fun personalities  you wont complete this in a few hours   you will lose track of what to do sometimes  its a lot of back and forth losing yourself in a maze of routes  key items can be really hard to find especially in dimly lit regions

fun little game but it has its flaws  the story and the characters ware great i liked the stealth sandbox but once you get the disguise it removes the challenge it is not always clear on what you are suppose to do a lot of the sidequest have to wait for the main quest to progress far enough in order to be completed most of the rewards are not worth the effort also the game crashes every time you exit

some really well made dialogues and plot twists here and there overall good graphics and sounds you feel like your in an adventure takes a minute to get into playing it but its good map system could have given you better help but overall a very nice game with a heart
